mapper.select: SELECT E.ID, E.NAME, C.CODE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN COMMON C ON C.CODE = E."POSITION" AND C."TYPE" = '직책' WHERE E."POSITION" = '04' AND E.DEPTNO = '00'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL (APPRNO, DOCNO, WRITER_ID, ATYPE, EMP_ID, APPR_STATUS, ORDERNO) VALUES (TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(APPRNO)) FROM APPROVAL)+1), (SELECT MAX(DOCNO) FROM DOCUMENT), #{writer_id}, #{atype}, #{emp_id}, #{appr_status}, #{orderno})
mapper.select: SELECT e.NAME , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM COMMON c WHERE e.SPOT = c.CODE AND c."TYPE" = '직위') AS SPOT, a.EMP_ID, a.ORDERNO , a.APPR_STATUS , a.APPR_DATE , a.SIGNATURE ,a."COMMENT" FROM APPROVAL a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.EMP_ID = e.ID WHERE DOCNO = #{docno} AND ATYPE = '01' ORDER BY ORDERNO
